name: skillsme-solidity-test
description: - Build a blockchain project with the language you choose. - Create an NFT Smart Contract with either an existing NFT or a new NFT created by you. - Build a Mint Contract for the NFT you selected. - Allowing any user with the Smart Contract to start an auction with a given bidding period, either blind or not of your choice. (Optional: allow users to choose whether the auction would be blind when they create it) - The balance of any user's wallet can never be negative. - Only allow one user to create additional coins for the NFT.
